components/common/shop:
USA's Best Saunas

WellSpa makes the USA’s best outdoor saunas and indoor saunas. Our barrel saunas are made of top-quality cedar and thermowood that is 100% natural. We have you covered with a large selection of home saunas, backyard saunas, and at home sauna kits.

USA's Best Cold Plunge

WellSpa is the USA’s #1 in cold plunge, with everything you need to make cold therapy part of your routine, including cold plunge tubs and ice bath water chillers. These cold tubs can be used as an ice bath or as an electric ice bath chiller kit.

Live your dream today with financing rates as low as 0% APR

Learn More

Create Your Backyard Oasis

Outdoor Saunas

Cold Plunge Kits

Indoor Saunas

Accessories

Shop with confidence

Fit for Any Backyard

Choose from electric power models fit for urban backyards, or wood fired models fit for backwood cabins.

Full Customer Support

We provide manuals, videos, and 1-on-1 support to make sure your project goes smoothly.

Warrantly Guarantee

Stress free purchases with a warranty included on all our Saunas.

Bringing You Closer To Nature

Why Choose WellSpa

Whether a personal sauna or shared with family, WellSpa has a sauna to meet your needs. Choose a compact sauna for 2 people, a small sauna for 4 people, or a large sauna for 8 people. All saunas are traditional dry saunas. Make it a wood burning sauna by adding a stove and chimney to most models. All saunas are for sale online and in person.

An ice bath benefits more than just your health, cold plunge benefits your mental health, sleep, and more. All cold plunge tubs and ice bath equipment are for sale online and in person.

How Our Customers are Creating Their Oases

View more

What Others Are Saying About US

The best life changing decision you’ll make. Ordered the 6 person barrel sauna two years ago and have used it almost every day since, without issue. WellSpa cares about making the customer happy and will do whatever it takes to make it right.
- Matt Chang, Oregon
Purchased the panorama sauna as a feature with our tiny house, and WOW - we love it! The kit was a lot of fun to put together. The materials are good quality, and the sauna heater is one of the best brands around! I would definitely recommend WellSpa to anyone in the market for a sauna, and keep a lookout for a review from me on their hot tubs - I hope to add one in the near future.
- Stephen Mallott, Washington D.C.
Have had a sauna now for going on two years. Craftsmanship is still solid and sauna still very much enjoyable. As a career firefighter and paramedic I use the sauna to relieve stress and it works well. Have told several coworkers about it and would highly recommend WellSpa.
- Adam Shuman, Connecticut
WellSpa had super customer service. They all were very responsive and friendly. The barrel sauna we purchased was easy to assemble. We purchased a wood stove and it has performed flawlessly. We have measured 200F a couple times. Thanks!
- Brenda Heikkinen, West Virginia
The team at WellSpa are so good that we bought 2 saunas!!! Everything was a delight with them - from original proposal/pricing, shipping (really organized packaging), installation (youtube instructions are perfect), and after-sale support.
- Don Miller, California
WellSpa helped me choose and purchase the perfect Dome for me. Jordan was very helpful and knowledgeable about the product, and Steve helped me with assembly questions I had. I appreciate the time they took to make sure I was happy. Thanks all!
- Noel Sharp, California
I am so happy I chose WellSpa when it came time to add a barrel sauna to my property. Not only is the quality of the sauna second to none, the customer service and help from the team at WellSpa was top notch. I would choose WellSpa again in a heartbeat.
- Dustin Myers, Coach of Ohio State Wrestling Team
The best life changing decision you’ll make. Ordered the 6 person barrel sauna two years ago and have used it almost every day since, without issue. WellSpa cares about making the customer happy and will do whatever it takes to make it right.
- Matt Chang, Oregon
Great price for a great product. Love our new tub and look forward to using it more and more over the winter.
- Michelle Boolman, Colorado
In today's world I don't get to say this very often. This product exceeded my expectations. The instructions were well written and thought out. I was able to get it done in one afternoon with a helping hand from my wife to lift and hold the heavier end pieces in place. Although there are only 2 or 3 of us, we decided on the 6 person barrel sauna and are very satisfied with this choice.
- Cliff Abbott, Utah
I got the Garden Sauna! Man, I'm thrilled with how it performs and how it looks in my yard. Thinking about getting another one for my cabin.
- Erick Lebel, New York
I did a lot of research to find the perfect sauna. I found the perfect one in the Cube Sauna from WellSpa. Having a daily sauna is now an important part of my routine. Thank you WellSpa for making that possible
- Jason Oppenheim, Host of Selling Sunset
We love our WellSpa wood fired hot tub! Perfect addition to Montana winters!!!
- Christopher Clark, Montana
I have always had an electric tub at my cabin, and I somehow stumbled across this wood fired product when I was looking for a new model. I have not looked back. This product was so easy to put together. It’s great value. It’s easy to heat up. The quality of the cedar wood is fantastic, and it also looks so damn good in my yard! Both my wife and me use it at all times of year. Great experience.
- Ben Reilly, Pennsylvania
I’ve been enjoying the heat every day since it’s been assembled and hooked up. Comfortable benches. Easy assembly. The cold plunge is an added bonus. Simple Intex pool pump is keeping the water clean.
- Kevin Walsh, Oregon
